event.title: How open is "Open Source", CeBIT, Hanover, Germany
event.body: In a panel discussion together with representatives from Red Hat GmbH, DTAG, synetics GmbH and HMW Consulting Ltd., FSFE's Vice President Matthias will discuss several edge cases of Free Software. The main question to answer during the discussion will be whether Free Software differentiates from proprietary software in every case. The event takes place at CeBIT from 14:30 until 16:00 in hall 6, block H01 and will be in German.
